property.name: content
property.description: This is the jinja template for /etc/sysconfig/vncservers file
property.value:
# The VNCSERVERS variable is a list of display:user pairs. # # Uncomment the line below to start a VNC server on display :1 # as my 'root' (adjust this to your own). You will also # need to set a VNC password; run 'man vncpasswd' to see how # to do that. # # DO NOT RUN THIS SERVICE if your local area network is # untrusted! For a secure way of using VNC, see # .
VNCSERVERS="1:{{vnc_user}}"
# user 1's VNC options VNCSERVERARGS[1]="-geometry {{vnc_geometry}}"
